_header: Long will be water in a well to keach
_description: On the folly of heaping up riches — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2251.First Lines:
LOng wilbe water in a welle to kecheA vessell made of yerdis that
                    wil nat holde…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…To gadre Riches hym to supporte and vpholdeIn age whan he
                    wexith fieble and holde
BLHar2251.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 288.
